name: Apache Telecom
overview: Apache Telecom provides wireless communications infrastructure construction services. The company provides real estate procurement, project management/consulting, permitting and zoning, warehousing, tower and civil construction, survey, CAD support, and inspections and testing services, including VSWR testing and tower inspections. It also provides electrical services, which include furnishing and installation of power circuitry, sub paneling, breakers, transformers, generators with fuel supplies, cabling, connectors, conduit work, and supporting hardware; tower services, including erection, improvement, and demolition; construction, such as excavation, form and rebar construction, and concrete finishing; and grounding systems for tower configuration, equipment, and compound. The company is based in Houston, Texas. Apache Telecom, LP is a subsidiary of MetroNational Corporation.
